projects.name: ExtendX Developer
projects.desc: Designed and developed an application to help users understand and interpret laundry care symbols on clothing labels.
projects.desc-full: Designed and developed an application to help users understand and interpret laundry care symbols on clothing labels. The app includes a visual guide, interactive examples, and a tutorial section. Implemented responsive design with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure accessibility on both desktop and mobile devices. Users can scan laundry labels with their phone camera and get instant care instructions. The project improves laundry handling efficiency and reduces clothing damage.

keyword.title: Laundry Care
keyword.desc: Helps users understand clothing care symbols to prevent damage and extend clothing lifespan.

keyword.title: Interactive Guide
keyword.desc: Provides visual examples and tutorials for easier comprehension.

keyword.title: Responsive Design
keyword.desc: Accessible on both desktop and mobile devices.

keyword.title: Label Scanning
keyword.desc: Users can scan labels via phone camera to get instant instructions.

projects.name: Sakdee Care+
projects.desc: Built a mobile app to assist users in understanding and interpreting laundry care symbols, with integrated map, weather, and cloud services.
projects.desc-full: Developed a comprehensive mobile app for laundry guidance. Integrates Google Maps API to locate nearby stores, Firebase for cloud data storage, and real-time weather API to recommend optimal laundry times. Users can scan labels, view tutorials, and get notifications for laundry care. Built using React Native and Expo for cross-platform compatibility.

keyword.title: Laundry Guidance
keyword.desc: Provides tutorials and label scanning features to help users understand clothing care symbols and improve laundry habits.

keyword.title: Weather Integration
keyword.desc: Integrates a real-time weather API to recommend the best times for doing laundry based on forecast conditions.

keyword.title: Store Locator
keyword.desc: Uses Google Maps API to help users find nearby laundry service stores quickly and easily.

keyword.title: Cloud & Cross-Platform
keyword.desc: Built with React Native and Expo for cross-platform support, with Firebase for secure and scalable cloud data storage.

projects.name: Sakdee Go+
projects.desc: A fun travel web app where users can log visited provinces in Thailand and generate shareable images for social media.
projects.desc-full: Created a travel web application where users can track visited provinces in Thailand. The app allows users to mark locations, generate personalized maps, and share achievements on social media. Implemented with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring an interactive map and responsive design suitable for both desktop and mobile users.

keyword.title: Travel Tracker
keyword.desc: Users can mark visited provinces and track their travel journey.

keyword.title: Social Media Sharing
keyword.desc: Generate shareable images to post achievements online.

keyword.title: Interactive Map
keyword.desc: Responsive and interactive maps for better user experience.

projects.name: Expo Image Picker Project
projects.desc: Developed a React Native app for selecting images and using the camera, as a hands-on learning project in class.
projects.desc-full: Built a React Native application to practice using device cameras and image picker functionality. Users can take photos or select images from their gallery and preview them within the app. Implemented using Expo SDK and tested on both Android and iOS devices. The project helped enhance understanding of mobile UI, permissions handling, and image management.

keyword.title: Camera Integration
keyword.desc: Use device camera to capture images within the app.

keyword.title: Image Management
keyword.desc: Select, preview, and handle images efficiently.

keyword.title: Learning Project
keyword.desc: Hands-on practice for React Native and Expo features.

projects.name: CPE406 Weather Station
projects.desc: Developed a weather forecasting website that displays current and future conditions using the OpenWeatherMap API in an easy-to-read interface.
projects.desc-full: Designed and implemented a weather station project using ESP8266 and DHT11 sensors to collect temperature and humidity data. Developed a web dashboard with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to display real-time and forecast weather information. The interface is user-friendly and responsive, allowing users to monitor conditions from any device. Integrated OpenWeatherMap API to enhance forecasting accuracy.

keyword.title: IoT Weather Station
keyword.desc: Collects temperature and humidity data using ESP8266 and DHT11 sensors.

keyword.title: Web Dashboard
keyword.desc: Displays real-time and forecasted weather information with responsive design.

keyword.title: API Integration
keyword.desc: Uses OpenWeatherMap API to enhance weather forecasting accuracy.

projects.name: CPE243 Light Walking Robot with LDR
projects.desc: Created a robot car that detects and follows light sources using LDR sensors to measure light intensity.
projects.desc-full: Built a walking robot equipped with LDR sensors to detect and follow light sources. Implemented logic circuits and motor control to adjust movement according to light intensity. The project demonstrates basic robotics, electronics principles, and sensor-based navigation. Ideal for learning sensor integration and automated motion control.

keyword.title: Light Following
keyword.desc: Robot uses LDR sensors to detect and follow light sources.

keyword.title: Sensor Integration
keyword.desc: Demonstrates integration of electronics sensors with motion control.

keyword.title: Robotics Learning
keyword.desc: Good project to understand basic robotics and automation principles.

projects.name: CPE345 Control RGB LED with Potentiometer
projects.desc: Developed a project to control RGB LED colors using potentiometers to adjust red, green, and blue intensity via an ESP32 board.
projects.desc-full: Created an interactive RGB LED control system using ESP32 and potentiometers. Users can adjust red, green, and blue channels independently to create custom colors. Built using Blynk app for remote control and monitoring. This project strengthens understanding of IoT devices, analog input handling, and real-time LED manipulation.

keyword.title: RGB LED Control
keyword.desc: Adjust LED colors using potentiometers for red, green, and blue channels.

keyword.title: IoT Integration
keyword.desc: Controlled via ESP32 and Blynk app for remote monitoring.

keyword.title: Interactive Electronics
keyword.desc: Hands-on project for learning analog input and real-time manipulation.

projects.name: CPE212 Voltmeter
projects.desc: Designed a voltmeter project to measure electrical voltage using ESP8266 (NodeMCU 1.0 V3) and Arduino, supporting a 0‚Äì24V range.
projects.desc-full: Developed a digital voltmeter using ESP8266 and Arduino to measure electrical voltage ranging from 0 to 24V. The system displays voltage readings on a web interface and supports remote monitoring. Project demonstrates practical electronics, IoT integration, and real-time data visualization.

keyword.title: Digital Voltmeter
keyword.desc: Measures electrical voltage in 0‚Äì24V range accurately.

keyword.title: Web Monitoring
keyword.desc: Displays voltage readings on a web dashboard for remote access.

keyword.title: IoT Data Visualization
keyword.desc: Integrates IoT devices for real-time measurement and visualization.

projects.name: CPE121 Smart Plug
projects.desc: Built a smart plug on ESP32 to remotely control electrical devices while improving safety and energy efficiency.
projects.desc-full: Implemented a smart plug system using ESP32 to allow remote control of electrical devices via mobile app. Integrated with Blynk IoT platform to monitor energy consumption and automate device schedules. The project enhances safety, reduces energy waste, and provides a hands-on experience with IoT hardware and cloud services.

keyword.title: Remote Control
keyword.desc: Control electrical devices via mobile app using ESP32.

keyword.title: Energy Monitoring
keyword.desc: Track and optimize energy consumption for efficiency.

keyword.title: IoT & Automation
keyword.desc: Automates device schedules and integrates with cloud services.
